forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a mixture of light rain and snow developing late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then becoming partly cloudy late. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then becoming partly cloudy late. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening changing to light rain and freezing rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening changing to light rain and freezing rain overnight. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
